definitions: resisting an attack made on someone or something; protecting from harm or danger

examples.text: the defending forces were met by a wall of enemy gunfire

definitions: competing to retain a title in a contest
shortDefinitions: competing to retain title in contest

definitions: conducting the case for the party being accused or sued in a lawsuit

examples.text: the defending lawyer pleaded for acquittal

shortDefinitions: conducting case for party being accused or sued in lawsuit

definitions: (in sports) protecting one's goal rather than attempting to score against one's opponents

examples.text: a free kick awarded to the defending team in their own penalty area

shortDefinitions: (in sport) protecting one's goal or wicket rather than attempting to score
